name: クリア
message: "Master! There's lots of noise deeper in the building! I think more are coming!"

name: ミンク
message: "So these guys were just keeping us busy."
Mink immediately takes off deeper into the facility.

name: 紅雀
message: "Hey! Don't run off on your own! ...Shit!"
Before Koujaku can run off after Mink, the men we've already taken down rise up like the living dead.
As he mows them down with the back of his sword, Koujaku shouts over his shoulder.

name: 紅雀
message: "They just keep coming! I'll hold them off here. You go on ahead!"
There's no time to hesitate. I run after Mink and Clear.
I see a passage up ahead. Are they down there?
